Annotation.description: An annotation describes information relevant to a file (or a range within a file).

title.description: A descriptive title of the annotation.

url.description: An external URL with more information about the annotation.

ui.description: The human user interface of the annotation, with information for human consumption.

ai.description: Information from the annotation intended for consumption by AI, not humans.

range.description: The range in the file that this annotation applies to. If not set, the annotation applies to the entire file.

UserInterface.description: The human user interface of an annotation, with information for human consumption.

detail.description: Text containing additional details for the human, shown when they interact with the annotation.

format.description: The format of the title and description (Markdown or plain text).

group.description: If set, this annotation is grouped together with all other annotations with the same `group` value.

AssistantInfo.description: Information from an annotation intended for consumption by AI, not humans.

content.description: Text content for AI to consume.
